actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide that compensation be allowed under chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, for certain work injuries which occurred before September 7, 1974.

summary.text: Permits compensation for certain work injuries sustained by Federal employees prior to September 7, 1974, the date on which an Act authorizing such compensation was approved, provided a timely claim was made with respect to such injury within the 15-year period ending on such date.

titles.title: A bill to provide that compensation be allowed under chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, for certain work injuries which occurred before September 7, 1974.
